channel.title: How to edit stairs

item.title: How to edit stairs
item.dc:creator: @popbob popbob
item.description:
@popbob wrote:

[quote=“Gol Goroth, post:1, topic:54388”]I’m working on repairing the slayer tower and I need to know the place to add what stairs do (especialy the changing height) I have manged to fixed the main door allready (example below).

I need the info to do the same for the stairs

f (objectID == 4490) // Door in 3429,3535 { if (absY == 3535) { teleportToX = 3429; teleportToY = 3536; } if (absY == 3536) { teleportToX = 3429; teleportToY = 3535; } }[/quote]

You could also do it like this:

if(objectID == 2025) { sendMessage("You open the door."); createNewTileObject(objectX,objectY,1504,2,0); }

Dunno if that’ll work, but it might. Just replace the IDs and object coords.

For finding coords of one end of the stairs (In this case, the upper end):

else if (command.startsWith("goupz") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Popbob")) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; heightLevel += 1; }

After that, use ::mypos (For coords) and teleport the player when they use that object.

Credits to the creater of P16 for making the goupz command :P.

Read full topic
